channel.title: What is misc.random?
channel.description: Uhm wondering? what is this and what does it actually do :\

item.title: What is misc.random?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Look in your server folders, and you’ll see a Java file named ‘misc’. That’s the ‘misc’ part of this.

The ‘random’ part is a method in ‘misc’. It chooses a random number using an int to know the maximum number it can choose.

For example:

       misc.random(5);

Chooses a random number between zero and five.

The method:


    /**
     * This method selects a random number.
     **/

    public static int random(int range) {
        return (int) (java.lang.Math.random() * (range + 1));
    }

The range number IS included. So:

       misc.random(3);

Could get either one, two or three.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
